title: Neural Network Image Classifier
description: A computer vision model that classifies images with 94% accuracy using convolutional neural networks.
longDescription: This project implements a state-of-the-art CNN architecture to classify images across 10 categories. The model was trained on a dataset of 50,000 images and validated against 10,000 test images, achieving 94% accuracy.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js and Framer Motion featuring interactive animations.
longDescription: A personal portfolio website showcasing my projects, skills, and experience. Built with Next.js for optimal performance and SEO, with Framer Motion for fluid animations and Tailwind CSS for styling.

title: Real-time Sentiment Analyzer
description: NLP tool that analyzes sentiment in text data from social media platforms with 87% accuracy.
longDescription: An NLP application that performs real-time sentiment analysis on tweets and other social media content. Uses BERT for contextual understanding and provides visualization of sentiment trends over time.

title: E-Commerce Platform
description: Full-stack e-commerce application with user authentication, product catalog, and payment processing.
longDescription: A complete e-commerce solution with user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, and payment processing using Stripe. Features include product search, filtering, and responsive design for all devices.

title: Smart Home IoT Dashboard
description: IoT dashboard that monitors and controls smart home devices with real-time data visualization.
longDescription: A web application that provides a unified interface for monitoring and controlling smart home devices. Features include real-time data visualization, device scheduling, and energy consumption analytics.
